name: Levine & Associates, Inc.
description:
Levine & Associates is a design agency that specializes in creative work for cause-driven organizations.Â 
The company was founded in 1988 and is located in downtown Washington, DC. Clients include nonprofits, government agencies and NGOs, foundations, and cultural institutions. The agency's work uses creative storytelling concepts to help organizations connect with their audiences, inspire action, and effect meaningful change.
